title: Partial Semigroupoid Actions on Sets
abstract:
We introduce partial semigroupoid actions on sets and demonstrate that each
such action admits universal globalization. Our construction extends the
universal globalization for partial category actions given by P. Nystedt
(Lundstr\"om) and the tensor product globalization for strong partial semigroup
actions given by G. Kudryavtseva and V. Laan, thereby unifying the theory of
partial actions for both categories and semigroups.
